Write-Up Text: People are discussing various aspects of the upcoming Federal Budget in Australia. There are calls for an increase in JobSeeker payments to alleviate financial hardship and a much-needed pharmacy reform. Simultaneously there are criticisms of the allocation of $4 billion towards the production of long-range missiles instead of welfare programs. The AFL awaits news on government funding for the Macquarie Point stadium and a controversial parenting policy is set to be dropped. Meanwhile the importance of taxing oil and energy giants has been raised compared to other nations.
